description: Azure Container Service for Kubernetes makes it simple to create, configure, and manage a cluster of virtual machines that are preconfigured to run containerized applications. This enables you to use your existing skills, or draw upon a large and growing body of community expertise, to deploy and manage container-based applications on Microsoft Azure.By using Azure Container Service, you can take advantage of the enterprise-grade features of Azure, while still maintaining application portability through Kubernetes and the Docker image format.
summary: Azure Container Service allows you to quickly deploy a production ready Kubernetes cluster.
